verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I will celebrate
Sing unto the Lord
I will sing to Him a new song
I will celebrate
Sing unto the Lord
I will sing to Him a new song

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
// I will praise Him
I will sing to Him a new song //

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Hallelujah, hallelujah, hallelujah, hallelujah, hallelu, hallelujah
Hallelujah, hallelujah, hallelujah, hallelujah, hallelu, hallelujah
